patthana23.28:4.1: Naācayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.28:5.1: Naācayagāmiṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.28:6.1: Naācayagāmiṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.28:6.3: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
